form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CREATION OF A RECORD OF LAWFUL ADMISSION FOR AN INDOCHINA REFUGEE, FORM 1-4b5-c(a) ( (SUPPLEMENT)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 FORM 1-485-C (a) (SUPPLEMENT) IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FORM APPROVED NOVEMBER 1, 1977 OMB No 43-R APPLICATION FOR CREATION OF A RECORD OF LAWFUL ADMISSION FOR AN INDOCHINA REFUGEE (PLEASE TYPE OR PRINT) 1. (FAMILY NAME, IN CAPS) (FIRST) 2. ALIEN REGISTRATION No. (MIDDLE) BUI A21-431-061 NGA QUANG TELEPHONE NUMBER 689-5361 30 DATE OF BIRTH (MO)(DAY)(YR) 4. CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH 4A. NAT ONALITY 12/31/15 5. MALE 6. Thanh Hoa, Vietnam Vietnamese SINGLE MARRIED FEVALE DIVORCED SWIDOW 7. YES No IF YES, ANSWER THE FOLLOWING: PUBLIC ASSISTANCE(SOURCE) TYPE FROM / TO Welfare DOLLAR AMOUNT Jun 75 / present 781.00/month PRIVATE ASSISTANCE(SOURCE) wife a schild none 18. YES No PERSECUTER OF ANY PERSON BECAUSE OF RACE, RELIGION, OR POLITICAL OPINION? IF YOU ANSWER YES, EXPLAIN ON A SEPARATE SHEET.
